message: Your turn to be fair, I'll take 60% this time. The clock is ticking and the money is shrinking!
I'll take a bit less, but still more than half. Time to agree!
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. I'm being more than fair. Take this deal before inflation eats away at your share even more!
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
Alice, let's be real. This is more than I wanted to give, but it's clear you're not being reasonable. Take this before inflation makes your share even smaller!
